to jailbreak a ps3, u need a ps3 with ofw 3.55 or less, then u can install cfw onto it and play games from the ps3 hd or external hd. If your ps3 is higher than 3.55 then u need to buy hardware that will enable you to downgrade your ofw to 3.55. Go to psx scene forums or ps3hax.net forums and ask questions there
